cast.overview: A novelist fed up with the establishment profiting from "Black" entertainment uses a pen name to write a book that propels him into the heart of hypocrisy and the madness he claims to disdain.
cast.title: American Fiction

details.biography: ​This Boston based actor can be seen and heard on various stages, in national commercials and corporate videos, and providing voice-overs. Originally from southern New Jersey, Joseph attended Emerson College, and graduated Magna Cum Laude with a BA in Theatre Education with an Emphasis in Acting.  In addition to acting, Joseph has worked as an arts educator for high school programs, theatre companies, and as a monologue coach with My College Audition.
details.name: Joseph Marrella
